grid.sql: select k.naimenovanie as klientName ,k.kod as klientKod ,m1.poryadok as d1 ,m2.poryadok as d2 ,m3.poryadok as d3 ,m4.poryadok as d4 ,m5.poryadok as d5 ,m6.poryadok as d6 from Kontragenty k join marshrutyAgentov ma on ma.kontragent=k._idrref --and case {marshrutMode}=1 then ma.denNedeli={currentDayOfWeek} else 1=1 end left join marshrutyAgentov m1 on m1.kontragent=k._idrref and m1.denNedeli=1 left join marshrutyAgentov m2 on m2.kontragent=k._idrref and m2.denNedeli=2 left join marshrutyAgentov m3 on m3.kontragent=k._idrref and m3.denNedeli=3 left join marshrutyAgentov m4 on m4.kontragent=k._idrref and m4.denNedeli=4 left join marshrutyAgentov m5 on m5.kontragent=k._idrref and m5.denNedeli=5 left join marshrutyAgentov m6 on m6.kontragent=k._idrref and m6.denNedeli=6 group by k._idrref order by k.naimenovanie limit {marshrutGridLimit} offset {marshrutGridOffset};
